GoldenEye::

She saw the flare go up and was blinded. She flew head first into a 
tree at high speed and fell to the ground with a thud. She lay on her 
back in eagle form, out cold.


--- In nbwrpg@egroups.com, kinger01030@c... wrote:
>  War heard the message. He sent out a comm coded to all the council 
members 
> at the battle. "Put down your visors or close your eyes now!!!!!!!" 
he sent a 
> solar flare grenade. It should take out the alliance's optics for a 
few 
> secinds. no matter where they stood the alliance members would be 
affected at 
> least a little. He pulled down his visor as the flare went off.
